title: Add shareable link (copy link) for the live website

requirements.text: Add a user-facing way to generate and share the current page link (copy-to-clipboard) so users can easily share the live website URL.

quotes: isnka link bana kar do na

acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled action (e.g., "Copy Link") is available in a discoverable global location (header or footer) and works on both desktop and mobile.
Clicking the action copies window.location.href to the clipboard.
A success confirmation is shown in English (e.g., "Link copied") and an error message is shown if clipboard access fails (e.g., "Could not copy link").
The feature preserves the existing luxury theme (black/gold styling) and does not break layout at common responsive breakpoints.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.

Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Frontend must remain React + TypeScript + Tailwind + React Query with existing TanStack Router routing.
nonGoals: Do not implement or promise a new deployment/hosting URL generation feature.
Do not add URL shortener integrations or external sharing APIs.
